meetings: CSV file that contains informations about meetings. The order of columns is as follows: Name_1, Surname_1, Name_2, Surname_2, Date (d.m.Y h:M format), Duration (in minutes).
infected: Name and surname of an infected person, e.g. 'Mark Howling'.
period: Infectious period of a disease (in minutes).
date: When was the patient diagnosed (d.m.Y h:M format)
